perturbation.original_text: This Form of Sub-Reseller Agreement (this "Sub-Reseller Agreement") is made and entered in by and between salesforce.com, inc., a Delaware corporation having its principal place of business at The Landmark @ One Market, Suite 300, San Francisco, California 94105 ("SFDC" or "Salesforce") and the Reseller named above and amends that certain Reseller Agreement between Salesforce and Reseller dated as of August 1, 2015, as previously amended (the "Agreement"). This Sub-Reseller Agreement is effective as of the later of the dates beneath the Parties' signatures below ("Sub-Reseller Effective Date"), provided, however, that the dates of the Parties' signatures are not separated by a period of time greater than ten (10) business days.
perturbation.changed_text: This Form of Sub-Reseller Agreement (this "Sub-Reseller Contract") is made and entered in by and between salesforce.com, inc., a Delaware corporation having its principal place of business at The Landmark @ One Market, Suite 300, San Francisco, California 94105 ("SFDC" or "Salesforce") and the Vendor named above and amends that certain Reseller Agreement between Salesforce and Reseller dated as of August 1, 2015, as previously amended (the "Agreement"). This Sub-Reseller Contract is effective as of the later of the dates beneath the Parties' signatures below ("Sub-Reseller Effective Date"), provided, however, that the dates of the Parties' signatures are not separated by a period of time greater than ten (10) business days.
perturbation.explanation: The original text refers to the agreement as "Sub-Reseller Agreement" but is now referred to as "Sub-Reseller Contract" and the "Reseller" is now called the "Vendor", this creates ambiguity as to which entity and agreement the text refers to throughout the document.

perturbation.original_text: SFDC hereby appoints SUB-RESELLER ("Sub-Reseller") as a sub-reseller to whom Reseller may resell Services in accordance with Section 2(ii) of the Agreement, provided that Sub-Reseller may only resell such Services to Customer. Reseller must ensure that Sub-Reseller complies with the terms of the Agreement applicable to Reseller as if Sub- Reseller were an original party to the Agreement and any breach by Sub-Reseller of the Agreement will be deemed a breach by Reseller.
perturbation.changed_text: SFDC hereby appoints SUB-RESELLER ("Sub-Reseller") as a sub-distributor to whom Vendor may resell Services in accordance with Section 2(ii) of the Agreement, provided that Sub-Reseller may only resell such Services to Client. Vendor must ensure that Sub-Reseller complies with the terms of the Agreement applicable to Reseller as if Sub- Reseller were an original party to the Agreement and any breach by Sub-Reseller of the Agreement will be deemed a breach by Reseller.
perturbation.explanation: The term "sub-reseller" is replaced with "sub-distributor", "Reseller" is replaced by "Vendor" and "Customer" is replaced by "Client." It is not defined if these roles are the same. This change introduces a contradiction regarding the roles and responsibilities of the parties involved and to whom Sub-Reseller can resell.

perturbation.original_text: The terms and conditions herein contained constitute the entire agreement between the Parties with respect to the subject matter of this Sub-Reseller Agreement and supersede any previous and contemporaneous agreements and understandings, whether oral or written, between the Parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof.
perturbation.changed_text: The terms and conditions herein contained constitute the entire understanding between the Parties with respect to the subject matter of this Sub-Reseller Contract and supersede any previous and contemporaneous agreements and relationships, whether oral or written, between the Parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof.
perturbation.explanation: The original text refers to the binding agreement as "entire agreement" but the modified text calls it an "entire understanding." Additionally, “agreements” is replaced with “relationships.” This creates ambiguity about whether the agreement is legally binding or just an expression of understanding. This undermines the legal force of the document.
